msg.msgText: Cannot run CleanStore. Due to an internal error, the server status is set to "Maintenance", however the configured mode is "Production". Use a REST call to get more information about the server status.

msgExplanation.p: Message Gateway server run mode 'CleanStore' requires Message Gateway server is in 'Maintenance' .

msgUserResponse.p: Change Message Gateway server run mode to 'Maintenance', restart imaserver then try the command again.
